```{r}
reticulate::use_condaenv("pyres", required = TRUE)
reticulate::py_config()

# get the full filename of the Eclipse binary file
proj_root <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()
unsmry_file <- file.path(proj_root, "inst/python/volve/VOLVE_2016.UNSMRY")
file.exists(unsmry_file)
```



```{python}
# this works if 

import restools.binary_parser as bp

parser = bp.EclBinaryParser(r.unsmry_file)
parser.get_dimens()
```


```{python}
# this works and is equivalent to the previous chunk

import restools as rt

parser = rt.binary_parser.EclBinaryParser(r.unsmry_file)
parser.get_dimens()
parser.get_actnum()
parser.is_dual()


seqnum_dates = parser.get_seqnum_dates()
unsmry_vectors = parser.read_vectors()
shape_unsmry_vectors = unsmry_vectors.shape
```

```{r}
library(reticulate)

py$seqnum_dates
unlist(py$shape_unsmry_vectors)
```
